QuestData.Title: Kaz the Shrieker
QuestData.RewardText: Commander, you go where you will and kill any who would stand in your way.$b$bI find this fun.$b$bI wish to join your... "followers"... as the lady wolf keeps calling them.$b$bMy home is crushed, my family mulched, and this place has lost its charm.$b$bLet me join you.
